info.title: SkillzCollab API
info.description: API for the SkillzCollab creative collaboration platform

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password

get.description: Retrieve a list of users with optional filtering and pagination

patch.description: Partially update an existing user profile

400.description: Cannot delete user with active content

get.description: Retrieve a specific user by their ID
Retrieve a list of briefs with optional filtering and pagination
Retrieve a specific brief by ID

isActive.description: Set to false to disable the brief (preserves brief and submissions)

get.description: Retrieve all submissions for a specific brief

post.description: Create a new submission for a specific brief

get.summary: Get submission by brief ID and submission ID
get.description: Retrieve a specific submission for a specific brief

patch.description: Update a specific submission for a specific brief

delete.description: Delete a specific submission for a specific brief (only if it hasn't been submitted)

get.description: Retrieve a list of portfolios with optional filtering
Retrieve a specific portfolio by ID
Retrieve a list of creative professionals
Retrieve a specific creative by ID
Retrieve a list of brands with optional filtering

parameters.name: business_field
parameters.description: Filter by business field (case-insensitive partial match)

patch.description: Partially update an existing brand profile

400.description: Cannot delete brand with associated briefs

get.description: Retrieve a specific brand by ID

patch.description: Partially update an existing brand profile

delete.description: Delete a brand. Cannot delete if brand has associated briefs.

400.description: Cannot delete brand with associated briefs

get.description: Retrieve all briefs for a specific brand

post.description: Create a new brief for a specific brand with base64 encoded images. Images are automatically uploaded to S3.

schema.description: Create a new brief for the specified brand with base64 encoded images. Images are automatically uploaded to S3.

description.example: We need a modern, professional logo for our new tech startup...

base64_images.description: Array of base64 encoded image strings. Images are automatically uploaded to S3. Maximum size per image: 5MB.

items.description: Base64 encoded image string (with or without data URL prefix)

tags.description: Array of tag objects associated with this brief

patch.description: Partially update an existing brief for a specific brand

get.description: Retrieve a list of reactions with optional filtering
Retrieve a specific reaction by ID
Retrieve a list of tags with optional filtering

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search tags by name or description

400.description: Cannot delete tag with associated briefs

get.description: Retrieve a specific tag by ID
Retrieve all reactions for a specific submission

parameters.name: submission_id
parameters.description: Submission ID to get reactions for

400.description: Bad request - missing or invalid submission_id

get.description: Retrieve a specific reaction by ID
Retrieve all portfolios with optional filtering
Retrieve all portfolios for a specific user

post.description: Create a new portfolio for a specific user

description.example: A collection of my best creative work

get.summary: Get portfolio by user and ID
get.description: Retrieve a specific portfolio for a user

patch.description: Update a portfolio for a specific user

delete.description: Delete a portfolio for a specific user

get.description: Retrieve all creatives with optional filtering

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Filter creatives by user ID (through portfolios)

get.description: Retrieve all creatives for a specific portfolio

post.description: Create a new creative in a specific portfolio

description.example: This is my best creative piece

get.summary: Get creative by portfolio and ID
get.description: Retrieve a specific creative from a portfolio

patch.description: Update a creative in a specific portfolio

delete.description: Delete a creative from a specific portfolio
